title: Gemini, Genesis, DCG Sued by New York Attorney General for Allegedly Defrauding Investors
description: The lawsuit alleges that Gemini knew Genesis’ loans were undersecured and at one point highly concentrated with one entity, Sam Bankman-Fried’s Alameda, but did not reveal this information to investors.

title: Bitcoin ETF Rumor Had a Silver Lining and It's Apparent in the Crypto Options Market
description: The bitcoin options market has flipped bullish across different timeframes since Monday's erroneous ETF report.

title: Tax Authorities in EU to Share Transaction Data Reported by Crypto Firms
description: New EU rules will introduce automated exchange of information on crypto revenues reported by service providers in the sector. A new directive adopted by the Union expands existing registration and reporting obligations as well as cooperation between tax administrations across the bloc. Information Sharing Between National Tax Administrations in EU to Cover Crypto Assets The […]

title: Marathon Digital entrusts Bitcoin holdings to Fidelity Digital assets
description: Marathon Digital, a prominent player in the Bitcoin mining sector, announced its strategic move to entrust part of its Bitcoin holdings to Fidelity Digital Assets. This decision marks the company’s shift from relying solely on a single custodian to embracing multiple custodial partnerships. The shift aims to enhance the security and management of its substantial ... Read more

description: The Loom Network (LOOM) token has defied the bear market as it targets $0.50 per token. title: Cardano (ADA) Price Prediction: What to Expect in the Next 48 Hours
description:
